title: Pixel 5 - strange lighting behavior from top in status bar area
content:
My device exhibits strange lighting behavior from the top in the status bar area.
It is some "white taint" that stays for a few seconds. Most obviously when pulling up and down the app drawer.

Confused? Watch this video. https://photos.app.goo.gl/XiMRG3YLjf5XcMNN6 

I barely set up anything. No non-Google app installed. Screen Brightness around 55%, 
Dark Theme on or off and Night Light on or off, this happens. It gets worse with Night Light off. 

Since writing the post, the "white taint" stayed, even after restarting. 
(video was with Night Light on, photo is with Night Light off)

It is gone when opening settings:


Anybody else experiencing this? 

Thanks in advance.
